actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-304.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2230) to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1957 to extend the life of the Civil Rights Commission, and for other purposes.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2230 (Civil Rights Commission extension).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2230) to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1957 to extend the life of the Civil Rights Commission, and for other purposes.
